Text: Mr Skilling Team Pipeline in Bakersfield is going to be SOLD to Pacific Pipeline and we just found out that we will be charged for the computers that we ordered We know that if we were to Quit or to be Fired We would have to pay for the computers But we were SOLD not Fired nor did we Quit It seems that Team Enron Quit us Is there anything that you can do to right this injustice Sincerely Team Pipeline
